content:
Apple finally revealed the iPad Air 5 (2022) during its Peek Performance event. The announcement was made along with that of the iPhone SE 3 (2022) and the all-new Mac Studio. description: Apple has finally revealed the iPad Air 5 (2022) with optional 5G support. Here's what you will find in the package when unboxing it.
